title: Year of the Goat Summoner Icon
body: Has anyone received [this ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/202048304/Icon_Year_of_Goat.jpg)yet? I sent mystery gifts days ago and haven't received it yet. I know they usually take a coupe of days, but this seems slower than usual.

replies.body: Keep panties in the on position.
i still didnt recieve myne T^T ive been waiting for a month and nothing has happened T^T
Good to know. Just making sure I wasn't the only one while the event was still running. Guess all we can do is wait =).
You guys will get the icon eventually. Stop whining.

Seems a lot of people are having this issue. I would even go so far as to say that the majority of people who earn it so far have not yet received it. 
I am going on 6 days since I sent the qualifying gifts. 
Many people have said to open a ticket, and am now sitting on 4 days with no response. 
It seems that the OCE riot team are just lacking. I don't usually like to point the finger, because I know that coding a game, and generating all the fluff can be time consuming etc, but seriously. It's a joke. NA are getting theirs within minutes. we are told to sit tight for three days, at the end of which we still do not get them. 
It just feels so underwhelming to spend real money so that you can send a gift for a personal reward, and it gets stuck in the cosmos. 

490 mystery skin box and 790 mystery skin box are the qualifiers for anyone wondering.

Having the same problem. Contacted Riot support and they said:

http://puu.sh/g1ZdH/11d6bf3386.png
It will come, up to 2 weeks after the end of the event (much like nemeses draft icon). Be patient

http://puu.sh/g1ZdH/11d6bf3386.png

According to Riot Support, we should only have to wait 72 hours tops.
I didnt get mine either D:.
Probably it'll come up today? It's a guess
Null panties exception: panties not found.
